price: Se estes fossem deuses, nela não ingressariam. E todos, nela, serão eternos.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
